A

AbstractBolt - Class in io.dataplay.storm.workers
This implementation abstracts away the management of the outputCollector, simplifying the implementation of other bolts.

ack(Tuple) - Method in class io.dataplay.storm.workers.AbstractBolt

calculateFields() - Method in interface io.dataplay.storm.workers.IDataWorker
This method asks an instance to determine its emitted schema.

Calculate the fields emitted by this bolt.
calculateFields(List<Fields>) - Method in class io.dataplay.storm.workers.merge.MergeBolt
The merge bolt fields is calculated as an aggregate merge of all incoming streams.

I

IDataWorker - Interface in io.dataplay.storm.workers
This is the base interface to which all spouts and bolts in our library must adhere.
io.dataplay.storm - package io.dataplay.storm
This package contains a library of storm bolts and workers that are designed to be centrally managed via a common coordination plane.
io.dataplay.storm.util - package io.dataplay.storm.util
This package contains utility classes and other methods useful across the entire project.
io.dataplay.storm.workers - package io.dataplay.storm.workers
This is the base package in which all of our storm spouts and bolts live.
io.dataplay.storm.workers.logging - package io.dataplay.storm.workers.logging
This package contains all classes necessary for the logging bolt, a simple implementation of a bolt which only logs the contents of tuples that it receives.
io.dataplay.storm.workers.merge - package io.dataplay.storm.workers.merge
This package contains the merge bolt, a very simplistic bolt which combines two data streams and their schema.
isShutdownTuple(Tuple) - Static method in class io.dataplay.storm.util.StormUtil
Tells us whether this is a shutdown tuple or not.
isTickTuple(Tuple) - Static method in class io.dataplay.storm.util.StormUtil
Tells us whether this is a tick tuple or not.
isValid() - Method in interface io.dataplay.storm.workers.IDataWorker
This method reveals whether the present configuration of this worker is valid.
isValid() - Method in class io.dataplay.storm.workers.logging.LoggingBolt
Returns whether this bolt's configuration is valid.
isValid() - Method in class io.dataplay.storm.workers.merge.MergeBolt
The merge bolt is always valid.

L

LoggingBolt - Class in io.dataplay.storm.workers.logging
This simple logging bolt simple logs the contents of a tuple before sending it on its way.

M

mergeFields(List<Fields>) - Method in class io.dataplay.storm.workers.AbstractBolt
